name: Dokan Store Carousel
author: Sohan Hossain Nabil

sections.description:
Dokan Lite plugin and Dokan Pro plugin are required to run this plugin

With Dokan Store Carousel include stores carousel by store category in your pages.

With a simple shortcode you can create wonderful stores carousel using Elementor as well.

With one shortcode for each carousel, create as many carousels as you want in the same page and/or different pages!

How to use Dokan Store Carousel

  • After installing the plugin you can use this follow shortcode [store_carousel] in any page to generate the carousel
  • The default shortcode [store_carousel] will show the carousel of stores from ‘uncategorized’ category
  • To create a carousel from a specific cateogry you need to pass an extra parameter inside the short code like this [store_carousel name=”your category name”]
  • Please note that you have to add space if you category name has spaces
  • Category names are case insensetive
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does the plugin use dokan store template?

No, it uses its own design

Can I create multiple stores carousels on the same page?

Yes, you can create several carousels.

Can I create multiple stores carousels using Elementor?

Yes, you can put the shortcodes in the shortcode widget or text editor.

short_description: Create quickly and easily a beautiful dynamic Dokan stores carousel for your marketplace website built with Dokan plugin.
